title: Sticky Toffee Pudding Cake with Caramel Sauce
ingredients: ['225g dried dates, chopped', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '335ml boiling water to cover', '75g butter', '150g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '140g self-raising flour', '175g dark brown sugar', '75g butter', '1 (170ml) tin evaporated milk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract']
